long_description: Our REI Evaporator Single ski bag helps protect your skis and a pair of poles during transport, thanks to tough, padded construction. Heavy-duty tarpaulin-lined interior fits a pair of skis up to 191cm in length and a pair of ski poles; dedicated internal sleeves hold poles neatly. Mesh panels and grommet openings promote air circulation and moisture drainage, helping combat edge rust. Compression straps on outside of bag secure contents; also use them to secure the folded-over end of the bag when you're carrying short skis. Webbing carry handles with padded hand strap ease transport. The REI Evaporator Single ski bag is constructed with rugged 600-denier polyester and beefy zippers to last many seasons.
short_description: Our REI Evaporator Single ski bag helps protect your skis and a pair of poles during transport, thanks to tough, padded construction.
